bookVillazzoSection.Heading: REASONS TO BOOK WITH VILLAZZO
bookVillazzoSection.BookItemContent1: Enjoy the privacy of a rental, with all the privileges of a luxury hotel, and your personal hotel manager on call.
bookVillazzoSection.BookItemTitle2: THE FINEST VILLA IN THE BEST LOCATION
bookVillazzoSection.BookItemContent3: There is no limit to either our contacts or ingenuity- whatever or whoever you need- your Hotel Maneger has a wide range of specialists waiting to serve you and everything is arranged at your request.
bookVillazzoSection.BookItemContent2: From smart homes to infinity pools, private wine cellars to rooftop terraces - the properties we choose aren't just breathtaking. they're fully kitted out with state-of-the-art amenities.

HomepageTestimonials.Heading: WHAT CUSTOMERS SAY ABOUT US
HomepageTestimonials.ClientReview1: David was a star. Quite literally saved the day!
HomepageTestimonials.ClientReview2: my stay at your place was amazing. your staff was impeccable and made my vacation comfortable and relaxing.
HomepageTestimonials.ClientReview3: We had a wonderful time! The house and service was Amazing!
HomepageTestimonials.ClientReview4: I'm very happy to see all of this communication Sonia. I appreciate your level of professionalism and your company offers a top-notch service!
HomepageTestimonials.ClientReview5: Our stay was wonderful as usual. Thank you for asking.

Inspiration.Heading: INSPIRATION
Inspiration.content: Where will your travels take you? Let us inspire you with our wealth of knowledge.
Inspiration.BoxContent1: ART DECO MONUMENTS WORTH A VISIT IN MIAMI BEACH
Inspiration.BoxContent2: WHERE TO FIND THE BEST POOL PARTIES IN THE WORLD
Inspiration.BoxContent3: NOW IS THE RIGHT TIME TO PLAN YOUR MIAMI VACATION
Inspiration.BoxContent4: FIVE LUXURY SPA DESTINATIONS FOR REJUVENATION

MoreVillaSection.Subheading: We create memorable vacations with bespoke touches and unrivalled customer service. Here's what you can expect from a Villazzo stay
MoreVillaSection.EndSubheading: Choose from the very best properties, in the most glamourous destinations around the worlds. We've trotted the globe, to bring them to you.
MoreVillaSection.Heading: MORE THAN JUSTLUXURY VILLA RENTALS

HomeGallery.FirstRowContent: Before you arrive the luxury villa is transformed by more than 100 changes that are exclusive to Villazzo but inclusive in the price you pay.
HomeGallery.SecRowContent: We transform the ultimate residence into a private hotel dedicated entirely to you. No details is too small; no service is too much trouble. Villazzo standards and service go considerably further -we expect the unexpected - indeed we plan for it.

HomeSlider.FirstSlideHead: YOUR ONLY DESTINATION FOR LUXURY VACATIONS
HomeSlider.FirstSlideContent: We get it. You want all the privacy of a luxury vacation rental and all the benefits of a five-star hotel, coupled with world-class service thinking ahead for you. We call it the ‘VillaHotel’ experience – a bespoke approach to lifestyle travel.
HomeSlider.SecSlideContent: St Tropez has more than its fair share of Beauty
HomeSlider.ThirdSlideContent: Our aim is to make your holiday utterly incomparable
HomeSlider.FourthSlideContent: All the staff and service you could ever ask for
HomeSlider.FifthSlideContent: Aspen has it all, all nestled in a magnificent landscape
HomeSlider.SixthSlideContent: Before you arrive the villa is transformed by more than 100 changes
HomeSlider.NinthSlideContent: Mykonos is the ultimate destination with unfiltered beauty
HomeSlider.TenthSlideContent: There are no limits to our integrity

HomeTabbing.Heading: THE AWARD-WINNING VILLAZZO EXPERIENCE...
HomeTabbing.Content: A 5-star experience that goes far beyond the service of hotel or the privacy of a villa rental. Your villa   vacation rental is organized around your lifestyle and our staff are dedicated solely to your needs our   Villahotels combine all the advantages of both a villa and a hotel, without the disadvantages of either.

HomeTabs.TabContent: Comprising the very best in the industry, our team is on hand to cater to your every whim for a seamless stay.
Fine food and drink is a prerequisite for luxury living. At Villazzo we take this one step further by opening up our black-book of world-class chefs to you.
Not just here to serve your needs, but anticipate them too – our butlers remain at your disposal 24-hours a day.
As well as our family-friendly facilities, our teams can organize activities, childcare, and entertainment for the little ones, whenever you need it.
Your luxury villa rental is stocked with only the finest labels, such as Frette and Godiva - to ensure you feel right at home. We’ll always make sure your favourite brands are within reach.
You can lean on our experts to organize transfers by land, air, or sea throughout your stay. This extends to hiring private transport of any kind.
Our housekeeping team deep sanitize properties, ensuring a comfortable and safe stay.
